## Core.Albums.find() method

Finds albums matching a key.

**Signature:**

```typescript
find(want: Partial<Model.AlbumKeys>): Result<TA[]>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  want | Partial&lt;[Model.AlbumKeys](./ts-music-metadata.core.model.albumkeys.md)<!-- -->&gt; | A Partial&amp;lt;[AlbumKeys](./ts-music-metadata.core.model.albumkeys.md)<!-- -->&amp;gt; describing the albums to be found. |

**Returns:**

Result&lt;TA\[\]&gt;

`Success` with an array of matching albums, or `Failure` with a message if no matching albums are found.
